links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,200
formula: mu(n)* binomial(2*n, n)/(n+1); or mu(n) * A000108(n).
prog: (PARI) je=[]; for(n=1,40,je=concat(je,moebius(n)*binomial(2*n,n)/(n+1))); je(PARI) { for (n=0, 200, if (n, a=moebius(n)*binomial(2*n, n)/(n + 1), a=1); write("b062627.txt", n, " ", a) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 09 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 04 2001
